installWeb3MobileBrowser: 請安裝含有 web3 瀏覽器的手機錢包，如 Trust Wallet 或 Coinbase Wallet。
installMetamask: 請使用 Chrome 或 Brave 瀏覽器安裝 Metamask。
betaWarning: 本產品仍在測試階段。使用者需自負風險。
noRecipient: 請輸入收款人錢包地址。
invalidRecipient: 請輸入有效的錢包地址。
enterCurrencyOrLabelCont: 輸入 {{ inputCurrency }} 或 {{ label }} 以繼續。
totalSupplyIs: 目前流動性代幣供給總量為
youAreSettingExRate: 初始的匯率將被設定為
totalSupplyIs0: 目前流動性代幣供給為零。
tokenWorth: 依據目前的匯率，每個流動性代幣價值
firstLiquidity: 您是第一個提供流動性資金的人！
initialExchangeRate: 初始的匯率將取決於你存入的資金。請確保存入的 ETH 和 {{ label }} 的價值相等。
exchangeExists: {{ label }} 的交易所已經存在！
label: 代幣符號
brokenToken: The selected token is not compatible with Uniswap V1. Adding liquidity will result in locked funds.
toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
addingLiquidity: When you add liquidity, you are given Linkswap pool tokens (LSLP) representing your share of the pool. If you don’t see a pool you joined in this list, try importing a pool below.
removingLiquidity: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
connectToSeeLiquidity: Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
dontSeeJoinedPool: Don't see a pool you joined?
creatingAPair: When you add liquidity, you are given Linkswap pool tokens (LSLP) representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
importingAPool: Use this tool to find pairs that don't automatically appear in the interface.
firstLiquidityProvider: You are the first liquidity provider.
ratioSetsPrice: The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool.
selectCurrencies: Please select both currencies before proceeding.
cannotCreatePool: The pool cannot be created, please choose another pairing.
estimatedOutput: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than {{slippage}}% your transaction will revert.
happyToSupply: Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.
tokenLists: Token lists are an open specification for lists of ERC20 tokens. You can use any token list by entering its URL below. Beware that third party token lists can contain fake or malicious ERC20 tokens.
listType: https:// or ipfs:// or ENS name
expertModeDisclaimer: Expert mode turns off the confirm transaction prompt and allows high slippage trades that often result in bad rates and lost funds.
useOnOwnBehalf: ONLY USE THIS MODE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
expertModeAbout: Bypasses confirmation modals and allows high slippage trades. Use at your own risk.
slippageToleranceDisclaimer: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
transactionDeadlineDisclaimer: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.
youDontHaveLiquidityYet: You don’t have liquidity in this pool yet.
